sentences.en: A metal has a crystalline structure.
And some minutely crystalline varieties, such as flint, may be opaque and of a waxy luster.
sentences.cn: 某些细小的结晶变种, 如燧石, 可能是不透明的,并具有腊样的光泽.

sentences.en: Both amorphous and crystalline polymers can yield and be cold - drawn.
sentences.cn: 无定形和结晶聚合物两者都能发生屈服并能冷拉伸.

sentences.en: Both spherical and regular crystalline forms are relatively rare.
sentences.cn: 球形的和规则的球晶形成相对来说很稀少.

sentences.en: Carbon steels exist in three stable crystalline phases.
sentences.cn: 碳素钢含有3种稳定的结晶状态.

sentences.en: China was the first country in the world to synthesize crystalline insulin, a bioactive protein.
sentences.cn: 中国在世界上最早用人工方法合成一种有生物活力的蛋白质--结晶胰岛素.

sentences.en: Crystalline substances, such as ice, or a metal, melt at a definite temperature.
sentences.cn: 象冰或金属等结晶物质, 则是在一定温度下才发生溶解.

sentences.en: Diamond is the crystalline form of the element carbon.
sentences.cn: 钻石是碳元素的晶体结构。

sentences.en: Gross crystalline imperfections like twinning are apparent to the unaided eye.
sentences.cn: 粗的晶体不完整性,如孪生体可用肉眼看出.

sentences.en: Immediately behind the iris is the crystalline lens.
sentences.cn: 紧靠着虹膜后面的是水晶体(眼球).

sentences.en: Otolith are found from many small crystalline otoconia.
sentences.cn: 听石由许多小结晶的耳石形成.

sentences.en: These are loose aggregates of a large number of primary particles of crystalline or spherical shape.
sentences.cn: 这些是大量晶体,或球原始粒子的疏松团粒.

sentences.en: They may also be manufactured from non - crystalline materials such as glass, cellophane or transparent plastics.
sentences.cn: 它们也可用外晶体材料,例如玻璃 、 赛璐珞或透明塑料等制造.

sentences.en: This strike will generally follow the structural trend of the crystalline rocks in the area.
sentences.cn: 这种走向通常与当地的结晶岩走向一致.

words.tran_cn: 结晶，晶体；水晶；水晶饰品
透明的；水晶般的；水晶制的

phrases.tran_cn: 晶体状聚合物；结晶聚合物

trans.tran_cn: 水晶的，似水晶的，结晶质的，清澈的
